Rantjs

Procedurally generated text with JavaScript

  View Project Source   Spread the Word

Make a sentence

Other sample sentencens

I need <amount> <adj> <noun.plural> filled with <adj.plural>

<title>, help! He <verb.ed> me and <face.ed> the whole time!

I like my <noun-shape>-shaped <noun-body.plural>

<name-male> likes to <verb-transitive> <noun.plural> with <pron.poss-male> pet <noun-animal> on <time-dayofweek.plural>.

Supported tags

Here's a non-complete list of currently supported tags


  <adj>
  <adv>
  <color>
  <relationship>
  <conjunction>
  <face>
  <face.d>
  <verb>
  <verb.ed>
  <yes>
  <no>
  <veb-transitive>
  <pron.poss-male>
  <title>
  <title-male>
  <name-male>
  <name-female>
  <time-month>
  <exclamation>
  <noun-round>
  <noun-body>
  <noun-liquid>
  <noun-insect>
  <noun-clothes>
  <noun-plant>
  <noun-person>
  <noun-tool>
  <noun-long>
  <noun-ball>
  <noun-article>
  <noun-drug>
  <noun-fruit>
  <noun-container
  <noun-instrument>
  <noun-sex>
  <noun-job>
  <noun-weapon>
  <noun-hole>
  <noun-food>
  <noun-vehicle>
  <noun-animal>
  <noun-shape>

Rantjs

Rantjs is a procedural text generator. The goal is to augment human creativity with the boundless potential of randomness.

The project is based on Rant. This implementation is made to be included in JavaScript projects.

Rantjs is created and maintained by Sven A Robbestad

Created and maintained by Sven A Robbestad © 2015. Source code and examples
